page.title: 15A DAY AT STAINBURN SCHOOL
page.content: I'm 14 years old and a pupil at {Stainburn School,Workington.}I go to school.It starts at 8.45 a.m and I arrive at 8.40 a.m.We have 8 lessons a day each lasting 35 minutes.My favourite lessons being History, Geography and French.I stay for school dinners.It is cafeteria style and my favourite meal is cheese pie and chips. {After school}I go to my recorder group.It is run by a member of the music department. We play a variety of different tunes ranging from waltzes to pop. I also play{hockey.}I play nearly all positions but my favourite is right wing. A club helps us to improve our hockey skills. {In the evening}I do a paper round.My friend and I deliver the Cumbrian Gazette.
